name: easy rib gloves
notes:
a lovely but surprisingly easy pair of gloves.
perfect for all the odd balls of wool that are just sat looking at you longingly from your stash.
you can use, double knitting, light worsted, aran, worsted, chunky, bulky or super chunky/bulky as instructions are given for all these plies, along with a clear guide on how to adapt them to any hand.
there is only one crocheted seam, and 2 ends on every gloves that will need to be woven in so virtually no sew.
i hope you enjoy making them as much as i did. they make up really quickly and are surprisingly addictive.

8 page written pattern
beginner/ lower intermediate level
